lines.text: I'm sorry to hear of the death of your father. He was, as they say, an honest injun.
This is a white man's knife. The man who owned this knife is a murderer!
Last night at the store I didn't tell all I know. Navajos say it is good plan to have two arrows for one bow.
Well, somebody has to, don't they?
You stay here and don't talk.
I won't talk. I don't know what to say!
What is this? Is this a sticking up?
Too bad about Wade being burned to death. He owed me a lot of money.
[the marshal has released Buck from jail into Jake's custody]
White man's justice is very strange.
White man's injustice is very strange, too.
Okay, you're running the show. What's on the program?
This gun can speak louder than words, Jackson.
Black Arrow is your son? Well, I'll be a son of a gun, I theenk!
[two gunmen waylay Pancho with pistols drawn]
Before they get to hang you, I will have the pleasure of shooting you, I theenk.
